trans-unit.source: Provides access to the property values of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern" /> object using its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.Current" /> or <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.Cached" /> accessors.
trans-unit.target: 해당 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern" /> 또는 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.Current" /> 접근자를 사용하여 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.Cached" /> 개체의 속성 값에 액세스할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of columns in a grid.
The total number of columns in a grid.

Hidden rows and columns, depending on the provider implementation, may be loaded in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree and will therefore be reflected in the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.GridPatternInformation.RowCount%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.GridPatternInformation.ColumnCount%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 숨겨진된 행 및 열 공급자 구현에 따라 로드 될 수는 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 트리 및에 반영는 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.GridPatternInformation.RowCount%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.GridPatternInformation.ColumnCount%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: If the hidden rows and columns have not yet been loaded they are not counted.
trans-unit.target: 숨겨진된 행 및 열이 아직 로드 되지 않은 경우 포함 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, an event listener is set up for a grid structure change such as a row or column grid item being added or removed from the grid.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 이벤트 수신기 눈금에서 추가 되거나 제거 예는 행 또는 열 표 항목의 표 구조 변경에 대 한 설정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of rows in a grid.
The total number of rows in a grid.

Hidden rows and columns, depending on the provider implementation, may be loaded in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree and will therefore be reflected in the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.GridPatternInformation.RowCount%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.GridPatternInformation.ColumnCount%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 숨겨진된 행 및 열 공급자 구현에 따라 로드 될 수는 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 트리 및에 반영는 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.GridPatternInformation.RowCount%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.GridPatternInformation.ColumnCount%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: If the hidden rows and columns have not yet been loaded they will not be counted.
trans-unit.target: 숨겨진된 행 및 열이 아직 로드 되지 않은 경우에 속성에 반영 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, an event listener is set up for a grid structure change such as a row or column grid item being added or removed from the grid.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 이벤트 수신기 눈금에서 추가 되거나 제거 예는 행 또는 열 표 항목의 표 구조 변경에 대 한 설정 됩니다.
